article_title: Piers Morgan: A Home Just Above the Gossip
article_text:
Piers Morgan, 48, is host of CNN's "Piers Morgan Live." He is author of "Shooting Straight" (Gallery Books). He spoke with reporter Marc Myers.

Much of what I do on CNN today I learned as a child growing up in my parents' pub. In the late 1960s and '70s, my family owned the Griffin Inn in Fletching, England, and we all lived upstairs. It was one big happy building. From age 5 to 13, I spent most of my free time...

twitter.description: Growing up in England, CNN talk-show host Piers Morgan lived atop his family's pub.
twitter.title: A Home Just Above the Gossip

article_summary:
Piers Morgan, 48, is host of CNN's "Piers Morgan Live."
He is author of "Shooting Straight" (Gallery Books).
Much of what I do on CNN today I learned as a child growing up in my parents' pub.
In the late 1960s and '70s, my family owned the Griffin Inn in Fletching, England, and we all lived upstairs.
He spoke with reporter Marc Myers.
